content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: light_blue_banner
inventory=[{"type": "bricks", "quantity": 32, "index": 25}, {"type": "chicken_spawn_egg", "quantity": 26, "index": 29}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 52, "index": 32}, {"type": "blue_wool", "quantity": 32, "index": 33}, {"type": "light_blue_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 39}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft a light_blue_banner, I need to place a stick and 6 light_blue_wool in the crafting grid. I will first move the light_blue_wool from slot 39 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Finally, I can craft the light_blue_banner by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
